feed.title: Sparkour
feed.subtitle: An open-source collection of programming recipes for Apache Spark
feed.rights: © 2016 by Brian Uri!. Released under Apache License 2.0.

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated to use the new features available in Spark 2.0.0, such as the SparkSession and the new Accumulator API. I will focus exclusively on Spark 2.x in future recipes, as that is the release most in need of solid documentation.

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated and tested against Spark 1.6.2.
